name: Coffee Scroll Biscuits Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 cup brown or dark brown sugar

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat your oven to 160 degrees for 15 min. Put your brown sugar, butter, and vanilla extract and spices into your mixing bowl or stand mixer and beat for 5 mins until light and fluffy.
Put in the egg and just mix until combined.
Put your flour in half at a time and baking powder and mix on low until it comes together or you need to fold everything together.
Add your currants and give the mixture a good mix by hand or on your stand mixer. Place your dough on to the bench and knead into a ball flatten into a circle and wrap in glad wrap for 30 min.
Biscuits: Roll the dough till its 1/2 cm thick and use two cutters to cut them one large and the smaller one for the chocolate do not cut all the way through just stamp it lightly.
Place all your biscuits on a tray lined with paper and bake in the oven for 15 min. Cool on the trays until cool for the icing.
Pink Chocolate Icing: Put chocolate in the microwave for 30 second bursts and mix each time till it is melted all together. Put 1 drop or more depends on you and stir until cool.
Ice your biscuits with a small amount of chocolate try not to go out of the edges. Let the icing firm and then place in biscuit jar ready to eat.
